tool_description: Give you random opera and its composers. Great for building music-related apps.
name: Opera
title: Opera

api_list.name: Opera
api_list.description: Give you a random opera with its composer
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://shinglyu-opera-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/opera"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shinglyu-opera-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://shinglyu-opera-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/opera"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shinglyu-opera-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
